Package edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces

Interface ItemInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
DinoCorpse, Egg, Fish, FoodItem, Fruit, Item, LazerGun, MartianItem, MealKit, MeatMealKit, PortableItem, Stick, VegeMealKit, WeaponItem
public interface ItemInterface
This interface provides the ability to add methods to Ground, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default int getHealValue()
    return the amount that the item will heal for
    default int getPrices()
    returns the price of the food item
    default void setHealValue​(int healValue)
